website_summaries.verdict: High value, low-cost smart scale that displays weight and transmits an impressive amount of data to your favorite fitness app.
pros: Displays weight but sends weight, BMI, fat percentage and many other stats to fitness app
Can sync results with several popular fitness platforms
Designed for an unlimited number of users
cons: Must remove footwear and socks to get a proper reading
Some say that the readings fluctuate inexplicably

customer_reviews.title: Good scales. Qr code in book isnt though. App is FEELFIT
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars purely because I struggled with the app. In the booklet there is only a QR code for the app. I had to download an app so I could scan QR codes only for it to scan an app called Lark... after downloading it it was clear it wasnt the right app. I then had to search through reviews and read through all the info on here to find the right app, which is called FEELFIT incase anyone else has problems. Once I found the right app it was very easy to set up & the scales and great.... although my results aren't great! 😳😂
customer_reviews.author: nikkileo

customer_reviews.title: Matches the big brands for half the price
customer_reviews.text: Has all of the features of the expensive body analysis scales at half of the price! Set up is really simple, can be used straight out of the box as it comes with batteries included. Just need to download the app and away you go! Gives you lots of insight into your body and allows for day-to-day tracking so you can progress towards personal goals. High-quality and sturdy build. Made of a thick glass which not only makes it look good, but makes it a very high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: High accuracy
customer_reviews.text: i have bought many scales, mechanical and digital ones, and i can say that this one is accurate, easy to use and can keep you on track if you plan to lose weight. all data comes on phone in realtime and can keep track of my family to check who will lose more weight :)
customer_reviews.author: Sam badw

customer_reviews.title: Not very accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered based on the reviews, I don’t think they are as good as people have made out, firstly I can weigh myself 3 times within 5 minutes & every time they are a good few lbs different, also the app, it doesn’t actually suggest any goals or tell you your ‘ideals’ obviously can be googled but would be nice to be able to have it all in front of you.
customer_reviews.author: alex hanrahan

customer_reviews.title: Not that accurate
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this purchase. Yes, it looks impressive & the app is user friendly, however over the course of 3 days it gave significantly differentiating weight readings. I wouldn’t recommend this I’m afraid
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: AVOID DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY DANGEROUS. PROFUCT ARRIVED ON THURSDAY. TRIED IT ONCE ON FRIDAY. TODAY WENT TO THE BATHROOM AND FOUND IT EXPLODED JNTO PEICES. THIS IS HAZARDOUS beyond doubt. AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Correct Weight
customer_reviews.text: First of all it doesn't give me my accurate weight says I'm 43kg, change it to stones 6 stones. If it cant give you the simplicity of accurate weight I wouldn't trust anything else it says. WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal brown

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: The scales change their mind with every single measure. These also say I'm roughly 4st lighter than I actually am which I mean I don't mind (lol) not a good indication of what you are loosing as it changes within minutes
customer_reviews.author: Soph

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have QR code reader
customer_reviews.text: Very clear figures on the scales, although only show weight in Kg or Pounds not stones, but once downloaded can get stones measurement on your phone. The instructions only give you a QR code to get the phone app so if you don’t have a reader it’s a problem. For reference you need to download the Feelfit app, if I had not found this out from someone else’s comments i would have had a problem. The scales are very light weight and easy to use I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: harrads

customer_reviews.title: Well built but i don't trust the app
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice scale with easy to read display but without the app its just a basic scale. The reason its losing stars is not due to the scale itself but the app it pairs with. Without the app, it's pretty useless and the app will not even let you connect to it unless you give the app location permission. Why a BlueTooth device needs location information other than to spy on its user's locations is beyond me. Big brother is watching
customer_reviews.author: A. Parkes

customer_reviews.title: Weighing accuracy is a little off
customer_reviews.text: Sleek weighing scale , easy to install app , shows a variety of body measurements like body fat, bmi, visceral fat etc ...but but but weighing accuracy isn’t good at all. Thankfully I had my earlier scale to compare and I could see that this new scale was off between one pound to 2.5 pounds . Tried calibrating it for 5 days but it continued to show additional weight of 2.5 pounds . I will be returning it soon .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Indeed a smart device !
customer_reviews.text: Accurate weight measurement and easy to use. I have been using this device for about more than couple of weeks and there’s isn’t any fault Tbh I can think of. Me and my wife use it for tracking weight almost daily and the app registers it automatically (there is literally no need to enter anything once you be registered on the app). The tracker on the app sends notifications and also syncs with Apple health /Fitbit app on the iPhone. I can set goal and set measurement reminders to my phone, See the daily trend etc. Was easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Varun

customer_reviews.title: Information easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: I scanned the code from the instruction book and the app downloaded with no problems. Once standing on the scales, the reading goes straight to your phone app and lets you know all the details indicating (fat, body weight, BMI etc) by numbers, and shows by method of a Blue, green, yellow, red scale if you are under/over a healthy range. This information is stored on your app for your use to compare daily / weekly. Easy to understand and to read. I am pleased I purchased these scales and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: NanaTeresa

customer_reviews.title: light and slimline
customer_reviews.text: very impressive little set of scales, but we have fights in the house over them. You change them from kilos to pounds in the app and it sets the scales. Unfortunately our son works in kilos we work in stones. The machine gives you total weight in pounds so you gave to do a calculation yo work out your weight in stones. The app us good though keeps track of your weight loss makes a load dropping noise if you lose weight. A lot of the features mean nothing to me really, how much body fat I have, water content etc... but my 18 year old son likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and great for post corona weight loss target
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with the aim to fight the lockdown bulge. Its swanky nicely presented with a glass top and comes with batteries. The can is linked to my phone through an app using Bluetooth this tracks progress in real time so will keep me motivated I am only in day two of using this and I love it it calculated muscle gain, body fat and BMI you can add multiple users on the app. I am very happy with this purchase as it does all the things an "expensive" smart scale will do all at a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: N. V-ayoola

customer_reviews.title: Very good for price.
customer_reviews.text: Have only had these for three days but am quite impressed. I’m not 100% sure they are totally accurate with all the different readings as they seem to change over night but the weight seems accurate based on comparison with old scales. The app is great. You can see a lot of information, as shown in the description, and this has been what is making me feel I will be successful with these as I have numbers to watch and work with. Scales are a good size, light and sturdy. The display is clear and it syncs with your phone easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very good but not quite perfect
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this item I thought I was buying a straightforward weighing scale. Getting a breakdown of component quantities was an unexpected bonus. The initial pairing worked well and I got the record of my weights stored on my phone. The visceral and subcutaneous fat numbers were a useful addition as were the bone mass , water content etc. For a while I didn’t get the extras. However since I placed my phone a little further away ( bathroom stool) I am getting the full version . Am pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Rachmaninov fan

customer_reviews.title: Keep me healty
customer_reviews.text: Its helps to keep me healthy, keep monitoring weight on day bases helps me to sort out daily diet and exercise. It actually motivates me to go out for exercise and reduces calories intake. It easy to connect with app to keep the record of the weight and compact size easy to store .
customer_reviews.author: Jessic

customer_reviews.title: This has really helped me to loose weight
customer_reviews.text: I have put on weight over the past couple of years. Repeated attempts to lose weight have failed but since I got these scales my weight is going down. As it tracks your weight you can actually see your weight loss trend. This has a enabled me to keep positive and not give up because of blips of weight gain. It syncs with my fitbit app which is great and also shows weight loss trend in a different way which is helpful. I think that all the other measurements such as body fat et are a bit gimmicky but interesting to know. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: R Reid

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive description by supplier
customer_reviews.text: supplier says this works perfectly with samsung health. Unfortunately it is not and never has been compatable. Deceptive description should be removed by amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mr E.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool in health kit can prevent major illness before it happens
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up. I have been tracking my weight daily. And am excited to see the figures go down and adjust. Tracks all useful things like weight, Bmi, visceral fat (how did I live without knowing this before), body fat and muscle, and is a really great tool for diagnosing issues that could cause heart problems and strokes. Before they happen and while you still have time to do something about them. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scales . Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Love the app and how the scales send the information to your mobile. Also how they just switch on when you step on them , no fiddly buttons . They are slim and look fabulous . Very pleased. Also very interesting to see BMI and how the fat is deposited on your body and muscles. It also gives you your metabolic age.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Y K D Phennah

customer_reviews.title: Weights are inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: The app for this works great. If only it actually weighed accurately. I have weighed myself 3 times in the last hour and there is a 1.5kg difference between them. If they can’t get the fundamental part of a weighing scale right, I’m concerned. Don’t waste your money or time, shame as the app itself is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing kit and post-lockdown shocks....
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing. The app is excellent. The background information via the app on health and the limitations of this piece of kit is responsible and clear. It has an astounding amount of information. There is a tracker to watch weight change. It just works. My and others actual weight was a bad surprise as have not owned scales for a year, well before lockdown - but hey, now there is a way to track getting back to where it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Wrayburn

customer_reviews.title: It does the job as advertised and it’s great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt this bathroom scale is well worth the money. It provides all the information you require to help maintain a healthy life style. Connects to your phone easily updates every time you step on the scale. Other big-name scales cost double or in some cases even more than this scale which does the job as advertised for considerably less money.
customer_reviews.author: Mack Penarth

customer_reviews.title: Great Scales!
customer_reviews.text: This has made me happy and extremely sad in one hit! I used to use the gyms scales as they had the same readings. With COVID that hasn’t happened a since March. My other scales were saying I was 5lb lighter. Theses babies put that idea to death instantly. I’m 45 my metabolic age on these is 52!! How has 4 months being at home relaxing aged me so much? Great little eye opener but be ready for some shockers. Great connection with Apple health all data saves instantly.
customer_reviews.author: June C.

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely suprised at how good the bathroon scale is !
customer_reviews.text: As a diabetic, I'd started on a low carb diet and realised pretty quickly that my 'ages old' mechanical set of bathroom scales just didn't meet my need. Decided on having a digital scale, simply for the convenience, then discovered a number different offering's and some with links to Apps (on your phone) capable of covering a whole range of metrics, from simple weight, through BMI, body fat, body water, visceral fat, skeletal muscle, BMR, fat-free body weight, subcutaneous fat, muscle mass, bone mass, protein, and metabollic age !! I was genuinely suprised at what it can measure/estimate. I would hessitate to reccomend this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Copley

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product that doesn’t cost a fortune. Really easy to use. Just open the app and stand on the scales and bing! Your weight is recorded in the app. App simple to understand. Only downside is that the scales show in lbs but the app shows in Stones and Lbs. The app shows you your BMI/body mass/water ect.
customer_reviews.author: sarahboo

customer_reviews.title: Falsely advertised
customer_reviews.text: Claims in the description that it syncs with Samsung help. It doesn't! Or certainly not directly. False advertising and I'm extremely unhappy having wasted my time. Returning!
customer_reviews.author: Corky0705

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, accurate and great value.
customer_reviews.text: I so love this!!! Took me ages to decide which scales to buy as my old reliable had finally given up the ghost. This is pretty, light and more than anything is so accurate. I have arthritis so I struggle to hold things, my last scales was not only heavy but quite thick also, meaning t’was difficult for me to hold - no issues with this. It’s light and so easy to hold and move around.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: These scales are great, extemely easy to use with the app, responsive, no delay in updating your weight within the app when you get on them. Measures a lot for you to work with and also provides your metabolic age which is great. Highly recommend this if you want an in detail analysis of your weight / progress.
customer_reviews.author: Has

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of info
customer_reviews.text: Love these scales. They send the info to their app on your phone and tell you everything you need to know in order to get healthy. Great way to help you get fitter and healthier. There are three of us in the house and we each have the app , so can check our weight, bmi etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good performer so far.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and use, seems very accurate (compared to conventional scale). The app is very straight forward and easy to use and supplies a great deal of useful personal health related information. If more than one person uses the scale then be careful the second person is not standing too close nearby with blue tooth on. It doesn’t seem to be able to distinguish between various family members. So best if weighing is done with everyone else keeping their distance. Apart from this little niggle, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: R Arwel

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and set up with my phone and Apple Watch. I wanted to track body fat and water along with weight. This has it all including bone and muscle mass. Even better than I thought for a great price. Nice way to track your progress.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Chauhan

customer_reviews.title: great set off scales
customer_reviews.text: Very spot on with weight love the fact it connects to my Fitbit so saves me filling in the infection VERY sensitive you MUST remove any foot coverings as the smallest bit off dust can and will give you a false reading Definitely 10/10
customer_reviews.author: sharon stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thinking it would show stones and lbs on your reading as my current scale doesn’t, unfortunately it doesn’t, you have to go into the app and convert it all the time, the app is informative. Iv also had an issue that even though the scales are set into kg now. They keep reverting back to lbs. I have contacted the customer service about it who replied quickly but the information still hasn’t solved the problem. So a little disappointed with them.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline B.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking scales that work brilliantly
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but have to for these as they’re absolutely brilliant! Accurate, fast and the app is great - it instantly uploads Wright, BMI, visceral fat etc and all in colour coding - green amber or red so that you can see at a glance how you’re doing. And then sticks your weight in a neat graph to follow over time. AND the scales themselves are super slim and look lovely - like they’ve been designed by Orla Keily! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Newman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this scale! I am in a new healthy and diet routine during this lockdown time. The app is easy to install with my iPhone. The reading seems right to me as it is the same as my old scale. The app can help to track the change of weight monitoring the BMI. Good value too!
customer_reviews.author: Chady1717

customer_reviews.title: Dodgy app
customer_reviews.text: The product itself hasn't proved to be bad, but the app you are supposed to use it with, is a different story. The app wants to know your coordinates to connect via bluetooth to the scale: not only this is technically unnecessary, is also illegal under the current privacy laws in both in EU and UK. I had the impression that the product was a gateway to something dodgy and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Luca De Vitis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: These scales are fantastic..literally took just minutes to download app and link my phone to them. So simple to use and understand and such a great addition to keep me on track with my weight loss. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MRSB12

customer_reviews.title: Good product. A bit overpriced
customer_reviews.text: A great set of scales. I wouldn't say it's 100% accurate but pretty close. After the 1st use it wouldn't automatically read our mass and send the information to phone so we had to figure out a manual way to do this every day. Slightly annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Spanana

customer_reviews.title: Working as a standard scale, wont connect to app
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to tracking my weight and everything else on the app, but unfortunately no matter what I do it just wont connect via bluetooth. I have a samsung galaxy A50 so should be completely compatible. I will mesege seller
customer_reviews.author: LoonyDounut

customer_reviews.title: Conversation not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I’m a bit confused with these scales!! They seem to weigh fine. But the scales weigh in lbs but I have the app set up in stone. There’s an issue with the conversion. If I manually convert the reading on the scales to stone it’s different to what the app tells me. By a whole 3lbs this morning!! So either there’s an issue or the scales are lying to me and trying to make me lose more weight!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Worked OK for a few weeks, not it flat out refuses to connect via Bluetooth. I have to step on and off it between 20-30 times before it eventually turns Bluetooth on and connects to the app. Obviously this all happened outside the returns window, so now I'm left with a smart scale that is anything but smart. I also can't use it as a normal scale as it doesn't measure in stones on the scale, only in the app. AVOID AVOID AVOID AVOID AVOID AVOID AVOID AVOID
customer_reviews.author: phillip dawson

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant set of scales
customer_reviews.text: Love these bathroom scales, they tell you everything you want to know ie, weight, BMI, body fat, your metabolic age and bone mass. there are a few more pieces of info you can obtain. All this is transmitted to your phone.
customer_reviews.author: hp2

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage I lost 50% of my body weight the day I bought it, linked it with with fitbit app and they congratulated me on losing 95.lbs in one day, shouldn't they be calling my a friggin ambulance?..
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Gielty

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate, keeps changing by big differences... 1 min im 58kg, 5 mins later 56 Tried many times to see accuracy but disappointed. Display is nice thats all
customer_reviews.author: Neil patrick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great with these although I haven’t checked the accuracy with a known weight. The display reads out in pounds not stone which was a bit disappointing but everything in life is metric so I should move on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great scales, app possibly inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: The scales are easy to set up & link to the mobile app. The scales are lightweight. It appears the scales are accurate measuring in lbs however, when the app translates the weight to stone & pounds it is not accurate. The app has had a discrepancy of between 2-3lbs heavier which would also make me assume bmi & other measurements could be out too but only marginally.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs H.

customer_reviews.title: Being so simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it so informative all in one information instead of having to use more than one device simple and easy to use the app is straight forward would recommend to any one you wants to keep an eye on there weight and bmi or just simply know how much you weigh
customer_reviews.author: waslin12

customer_reviews.title: Accurate scales
customer_reviews.text: Syncs with Fitbit very easily, a bit of a pain u have to register with app to get full functionality but otherwise I’m pleased with the accuracy of these scales and size and design is just right for me
customer_reviews.author: Jason P

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It sure how accurate these are as have nothing to compare against, but they seem ok. Very easy to use. Got two different accounts setup. Readings seem consistent with each other. I’m happy. The app is great, tracks lots of different things so you can see your progress.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Scargill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to go on a diet & accidentally came across this product, I'ts perfect not just to keep track of weight but also measures your BMI, body fat, visceral fat & so much more. The app is perfect & so easy to use, just step on scales & all the info immediately sent to your mobile device, simple and effective and provides a chart of your progress, 60 years of age and found this so easy to set up, amazing & impressive bit of essential technology..
customer_reviews.author: mrs t phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good product, easy to use and informative
customer_reviews.text: I really like these scales and I love that they can track your progress via the app (using bluetooth). It gives me a different angle to aim for on my weight loss journey, easy to use, lightweight, just need to add 2 AA batteries and your golden :0)
customer_reviews.author: Bleph101x

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of scales.
customer_reviews.text: Good scales. Obviously the info that it collects is subjective. But as a guide to health they work well. The only glitch is in the conversion. It cannot concert from pounds to stones correctly. Example if you weigh 10st it should say 114lb. But is more likely to say some else. So I use the scales in pounds and then either just divide it myself or use the apple app which the scales connect to aswell. All in all very good and I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great scales easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased. Never tried one of these scales before so very happy. Very easy to use and app is brilliant. My only slight disappointment is scales only measure in kg and not stone and pounds. Not a problem of you use the app as it will convert but if you just wanted a quick measurement and wanted stones then you dont have the option.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother looking elsewhere, these scales are brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic scales. If you're trying to lose weight then these are the scales to buy. Very easy to set up to your phone. Loaded with information via the app to help you lose that weight.
customer_reviews.author: Squaddie...

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this scales. Myself, my husband and son all use this with our own information on our smart phones. Picks up the scales straight away and gives all the information you could need.
customer_reviews.author: Eloise

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great! All my family are using these scales, as we’re all on a big fitness push at the moment. They are so much better than and old pair I used to have were you had to programme user 1,2,3 etc. The information goes straight to the app easily. Couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.author: mrs karen thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use. It works perfectly and the app is very detailed with lots of information about your body. I really like it. It connects perfectly with the app once you weight yourself and send all the info accurately. Really happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ir

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like just how honest these scales are!!! These are fantastic and the app to go with them is equally as amazing! So much information, maybe too much 😅😅
customer_reviews.author: Mikyla

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, brings down the hassle of noting down the figures every week!! User friendly app that calculates the BMI! It keeps track of the entire family in matter of secs!! Absolutely brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: V Vem

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Did not know what to expect. Arrived well packaged. On opening, the product looked and felt quality. It is lightweight and looks good. I expected the set up with my mobile blue tooth to be difficult. I was WRONG. Before I knew it was downloaded and after filling personal detail it was up and running. The problem of course ................. my weight - can't blame the scale!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin James

customer_reviews.title: Get different readings depending how you stand
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, mobile app syncs nicely with Fitbit and My Fitness Pal. Very sensitive, so make sure you stand straight otherwise you get different readings if your weight isn’t evenly distributed
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with how much info you can get from the app however I dont believe its accurate. The app adds 2lbs when it converts to stone. So the scales say 145lbs which would be 10.3stone but the app says I'm 10stone 5 if this calculations wrong then how accurate are the others.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Handy BMI weighing scales with use of a app
customer_reviews.text: Bought these scales as I wanted to understand bmi and body weight better. On a weightloss journey. Did exactly what I thought it would. Handy weighing scales
customer_reviews.author: E. English

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to read your weight
customer_reviews.text: The scales arrived the next day after ordering, so a really speedy delivery. I haven’t downloaded the app yet so I can’t comment on this yet. The scales look really nice, are thin but sturdy and look like a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: BuzyLizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great info
customer_reviews.text: Great scales, great connecting to my phone dislike how when its in stones its in lbs on my phone also the dishearting bell that goes " TING" when you step on scales
customer_reviews.author: A happy hippy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't weigh up
customer_reviews.text: These broke after 2 days use. The app was ok and initially they seemed accurate, however within a couple of days the things front "feet" were mangled - trust me, I'm not that heavy (90kg) and wasn't using it as trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Djugly

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: bought this after being recommended by a friend. very easy to set up and the app is very good, plenty of info to track. would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mahonga

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate with multiple readings
customer_reviews.text: I got this scale primarily for its basic functionality to measure weight, and not for the app or the body fat measurements etc. However I find the weight will fluctuates 1-2kg per weighing even when I test multiple times in a 10 minute period, sometimes immediately after. Can't really vouch for the accuracy of the product because of this, although it looks pretty. Unfortunate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Very easy to set up and use and I guess it’s accurate, but I’ve no way of knowing that! It’s good that you can have multiple users also. The supporting app is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Newms82

customer_reviews.title: good and recommended
customer_reviews.text: The scales at home were not accurate. So I bought this new scale, it has many new functions than my previous scale, it can measure body fat, water content, muscle mass and other data. These data have effectively helped me lose fat, and let me know clearly what I need to do to become healthy.
customer_reviews.author: qiuting jiang

customer_reviews.title: Weightloss here i come
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely ready to achieve goals. Easy to set up download the app enable Bluetooth and location, stand on the scales and wa la. All info sent to the app.
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Pretty poor for accuracy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice looking product very smart and stylish. Accuracy is terrible though can get on scales and give you 1 reading and then get off and get back on and get a very different reading. Prompting the app to ask if it’s the same person on the scales because it’s a very different weight!!! You can either loose a couple of kilos or gain them in the space of seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Weigh hey
customer_reviews.text: I like these scales, they are pretty accurate and have lots of information for those that require it and understand it all. Tracking data is useful.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle235

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing I was looking into the fit track ones for £52 but I have done research and these are the exact same. They are extremely accurate and load on to an app so you don’t have to remember your weight. Excellent for weight loss and tracking body fat. Must buy !
customer_reviews.author: Kat 1991

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.text: The idea of these scales is great. But my problem lies in the fact that I’ve got to step on them 4 or 5 times before I get even a semblance of truth. How my weight can vary by half a stone in seconds is incredible. So although the extra information the scales provide is interesting, I don’t trust it to tell me my actual weight. If I hadn’t disposed of the packaging it would of gone back ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Abby S

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m a complete technofobe but these scales are so simple to connect up to a mobile for use! Scales look very modern, lightweight and compact. Easy to use and accurate . Happy with my purchase and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Great value scales
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant scales to keep you motivated to lose weight. Easy to use and very simple set up. Accurate information and clear to understand. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Glynn

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: The body scale is useful for scaling yout weight and because the item is made of glass it makes cleaning up easier so you dont need to worry about messy body scale! Not only is it easy to use and us accurate, it's also easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: qing

customer_reviews.title: Good App, not sure about accuracy of scales..
customer_reviews.text: The scales work really well with the app and its easy to download. I maked it down one star for accuracy as I dont think they are completely accurate. I weigh a whole stone more on these scales than ordinary scales. I knew my others were too kind and not very accurate which is why I bought these, however they seem to be unkind. It would be interesting to read what other reviews have said about accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura James

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable
customer_reviews.text: works well, looks good, app is excellent. ideally would have brighter display for daytime use, but app means readout is not really required. great value and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Absolute rubbish. The batteries have already run out after only 3 months. I’ve been using my scales as part of a weight loss journey and thought I was doing really well. Turns out the batteries were just running out. I had to replace them today and apparently gained a quarter of my body weight in a day. I guess I can’t rely on these scales at all
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Really useful!
customer_reviews.text: I wondered how accurate this was going to be for the price I paid & I really have to say I’m impressed. Of course it states it’s to be used as a guide within a fitness journey and not for the basis of medical treatment but that’s exactly what I ordered it for. Fantastic product. The app is also really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, smart looking scales
customer_reviews.text: Does what they are meant to do. Accurate Connect to my phone, and give lots of data. Can add family members. Brill
customer_reviews.author: VICKYB

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super set of scales, easy to use and easy to set up on your phone. Not sure how accurate they are as I’ve only weighed on these as slimming world was cancelled due to covid. So not compared them yet to there scales or doctors scales. But I’m weighing roughly the same on these as at slimming world.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Densley

customer_reviews.title: Digital screen that won't run out of numbers when you stand on it or read... "computer says no"
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it said that it would work with my Samsung Fitness App, it doesn't. Bluetooth doesn't connect (on my two phones anyway) but if you follow the guide, use the QR code and download the app you can still use it. I guess the last thing I want to add is that it will remind you of how fat you are which is another reason why I bought it :)
customer_reviews.author: paddy_c

customer_reviews.title: Superb.
customer_reviews.text: A game changer for me however it will only work for one person so far as I can see. It takes all of your data and uses that from the dimensions of that one person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and brilliant for tracking on app !
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to set up with app and seems very accurate. Gives a lot of different information such as visceral fat etc Definitely recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Lara Surtees

customer_reviews.title: A lot of information for low price
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, it gives you a lot of information. The price is very nice and I've already recommended it to my friend. Thanks to the app you can keep track of your progress (keeping your weight the same, gaining or losing weight) and it also shows you if you have good numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Lucie

customer_reviews.title: Help someone on their weightloss journey!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. Not sure if it was appreciated, as the recipient has put on 8lbs (not the scales' fault). I think it's useful to know it comes in a brown box - not a designed up box as you may expect from electrical goods. Otherwise, seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Courtnay Baird

customer_reviews.title: Should have brought before
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, good instructions to follow, very pleased. Light weight, easy to use, results on app in an instant!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scales
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the scales, tells you all sorts of readings which is handy to monitor as I have just started a diet. Easy to set up too just scan the QPR code and install the app.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. It doesn’t even work
customer_reviews.text: So I went from 12 stone to 10 stone to 11 stone in 2 days It’s annoying because there company’s always buy there reviews so you never know if it works or not. I’m not sure why amazon recommended this. It’s a load of rubbish. Do not buy. Waste of money and time
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very technical Looking piece of equipment. Easy to use. I do worry how strong the glass is when I put it on the hard floor.
customer_reviews.author: keviin saunders

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive and accurate machine
customer_reviews.text: personal home body measuring apparatus. Works very well but my phone s fail to scan it most of the times on the Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Eric Asare

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect stats
customer_reviews.text: All detailed stats are made up, not accurate at all. The weights seems close to correct but that’s about it. My overall weight falls in obese category with fat % showing as 16%, where as in reality my fat % is 30% as per professional machine in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Zaigham

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Focuses the mind on what you need to do. Also has interesting areas of the body’s function within the app.
customer_reviews.author: martin rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Neat app, neat scales
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, is light weight, easy to use, app is really clever, seems to be accurate so far but weighs 1lb heavier than my old digital scales. Only drawback is it doesn’t show stones on the actual scales. However not a problem as the app can be set to stones easily and I record my weight changes on there anyway. App is great. I’m so glad I bought these scales.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bluetooth Body Fat Scale, Healthkeep Smart Wireless BMI Bathroom Weight Scale Body Composition Monitor Health Analyzer (Blue)

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
